title: Warpips
description: Warpips is what would happen if Command and Conquer and Nexus Wars had a baby made out of tanks and napalm! Set loose the engine of war and watch the chaos of physics-based combat explode onto the battlefield Assemble your army from a diverse roster of infantry, vehicles and airplanes. Deploy troops, call down airstrikes, and launch missiles â€“ all without that pesky micromanagement. POSTAL 4: No Regerts

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4600 @ 2.4ghz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6400 @ 2.4ghz
system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 420 or ATI Radeon HD 5570
